statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ -11 \\ 8 \\ 11 \\ 22 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -39 \\ -26 \\ 26 \\ 26 \\ 52 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
